name: Bhansali Stainless Wire
tag_list: kitchen-baskets, trolleys, cable-trays, mesh, electrodes, nails-
overview:
Bhansali is a world renowned manufacturer of various Stainless Steel Products. Bhansali established in 1996 its Stainless Steel Wire manufacturing facilities to meet the growing needs of domestic and international customers. Bhansali Group is in the Stainless Steel business since 1970.

Our Products : Springs, Cold Heading, Kitchen Baskets, Trolleys, Cable Trays , Mesh, Electrodes, Nails, Staples, Steel Balls, Steel Shots, Wall Ties, Scrubbers, Ropes, Filter Cages, Spokes and various others.

Quality Assurance: Quality Assurance At Bhansali starts with understanding the Customers Requirement and continues till the customer is completely satisfied with the delivery of products and services. Quality Control procedures are well defined and thoroughly implemented.

Our Infrastructure: We have constructed a sophisticated infrastructure facility at our premises, which enable us to manufacture our range of Stainless Steel Wires with utmost perfection.
